justification: Misreads Team B: they value reliable RB workloads and consistency, not ‘shake-up’ upside WRs. Asking for B’s most stable RB (Sam Lewis) for a declining-role, boom-bust WR (Devon Moore) clashes with B’s needs and preferences. Ignores B’s TE issues and stack preference. Value/tier imbalance and inflated 0.7 accept probability. Rationale is generic and lacks roster- or context-specific evidence.
